  1. Community


    Spotlights


    get involved with the glens falls community


  1. City Reminds Public About Temporary Roadside Sign Rules

    As good weather returns to the area, temporary signs are popping up around the City in the public right-of-way. Those wishing to plant temporary signs along the roadside should be aware of the rules governing such signs in the City of Glens Falls Read on...

  2. Glens Falls & Queensbury Celebrate Earth Day Saturday April 20th Noon-4 PM @ City Park

    Earth Day Event with live music in the bandstand, speakers including Mayor Dan Hall, Supervisor John Strough, Dr. Stephen Danna, and Supervisor Claudia Braymer Read on...

  3. Sound The Alarm Save A Life

    The City of Glens Falls & American Red Cross are offering FREE home smoke alarms with installation. Read on...

  4. 2019 Spring Water Main & Hydrant Flushing Program

    The water main & fire hydrant flushing program is scheduled to begin on Monday, April 8, 2019. Read on...

  5. Hunter Education Field Day for Home Study Course - Dunham's Bay Fish & Game

    The following classes are being offered at Dunham's Bay Fish & Game on Tuesday April 23rd, 2019 from 9 AM to 5 PM. Space is limited to 30 seats! Read on...

  6. Glens Falls Arts District April 2019 Featured Events

    Take a look at the upcoming art events in Glens Falls Read on...

  7. Glens Falls Indians Win It All In The Federation Tournament Of Champions

    In what was no doubt one of the most exciting and anticipated games ever to be played at the Cool Insuring Arena, the Glens Falls Indians boys basketball team won the Class B overall state title 88-79 over Cardinal O'Hara. Read on...

  8. Students From Saga City, Japan Visit Mayor Hall

    We were very excited to welcome students from Saga City, Japan to Glens Falls City Hall today, Tuesday March 19th Read on...

  9. Glens Falls Named Best Sports Town In New York State

    MaxPreps has named Glens Falls the best high school sports town in the entire state of New York. The site names one top high school sports town in all 50 states. Read on...

  10. Glens Falls Cemetery Has Been Placed on the National Register of Historic Places

    Read on...
